member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.SelectionMode
member.summary: This is an Enum. It represents the count of date cell has been selected. It has three values namely SingleSelection,MultiSelection and RangeSelection.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.SelectionMode.SingleSelection
member.summary: Allows to select only one date in month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.SelectionMode.MultiSelection
member.summary: Allows to select the multiple dates in month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.SelectionMode.RangeSelection
member.summary: Allows to select the continuous range of dates in month.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.ViewMode
member.summary: This is an Enum. It provides a two types of views to display the month and year view of calendar.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.ViewMode.MonthView
member.summary: Displays the dates are in month visual representation. It is default mode.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.ViewMode.YearView
member.summary: Displays the dates of calendar in year visual representation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.TransitionMode
member.summary: This is an Enum. It provides a four types of transition animations while changing month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.TransitionMode.Card
member.summary: The card transition animation will appear while changing month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.TransitionMode.Float
member.summary: The float transition animation will appear while changing month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.TransitionMode.Reveal
member.summary: The reveal transition animation will appear while changing month.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.TransitionMode.Scroll
member.summary: The scroll transition animation will appear while changing month.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.LabelAlignment
member.summary: Aligns the label in the Calendar control in either of the directions.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.LabelAlignment.Left
member.summary: Aligns the label towards the left.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.LabelAlignment.Right
member.summary: Aligns the label towards the right.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.LabelAlignment.Center
member.summary: Aligns the label towards the center.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.DayLabelTextAlignment
member.summary: This is an Enum. It represents the alignment position of day label in calendar month view and yearview.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.DayLabelTextAlignment.Center
member.summary: align the day label text at center.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.DayLabelTextAlignment.Right
member.summary: align the day label text at rigth side.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.DayLabelTextAlignment.Left
member.summary: align the day label text at left side.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.ICalendarDirection
member.summary: This is an Interface. It provides a support to access the native platform direction method with use of Dependency service. It holds Backward() and Forward().

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.ICalendarDirection.Backward
member.summary: Provides a support to navigate the month or year in backward without any swiping gesture.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SfCalendar.XForms.ICalendarDirection.Forward
member.summary: Provides a support to navigate the month or year in forward without any swiping gesture.
